title: SNL to Re-Air First-Ever Episode From 1975 in Celebration of 50th Anniversary
description: Hosted by George Carlin, the episode will rebroadcast on Saturday, February 15th. SNL to Re-Air First-Ever Episode From 1975 in Celebration of 50th Anniversary Scoop Harrison
author: Scoop Harrison
excerpt: Saturday Night Live will re-air its first-ever episode from October 11th, 1975, in celebration of the show’s 50th anniversary on Saturday, February 15th, at 11:00 p.m. ET/PT.
text: Saturday Night Live will re-air its first-ever episode from October 11th, 1975, in celebration of the show’s 50th anniversary on Saturday, February 15th, at 11:00 p.m. ET/PT. The inaugural episode of SNL — then known simply as Saturday Night — was hosted by George Carlin and featured musical guests Billy Preston and Janis Ian. The episode also featured an appearance from comedian Andy Kaufman and a sketch from Muppets creator Jim Henson, as well as SNL cast members Dan Aykroyd, John Belushi, Chevy Chase, Jane Curtin, Garrett Morris, Laraine Newman, and Gilda Radner. The lead-up to the episode was recently dramatized in Jason Reitman’s film, Saturday Night. The rebroadcast of SNL’s first episode is part of a huge celebratory weekend that also includes a Friday night concert from Radio City Music Hall, and a three-hour live primetime special taking place on Sunday, February 16th.
html:
Saturday Night Live will re-air its first-ever episode from October 11th, 1975, in celebration of the show’s 50th anniversary on Saturday, February 15th, at 11:00 p.m. ET/PT.

The inaugural episode of SNL — then known simply as Saturday Night — was hosted by George Carlin and featured musical guests Billy Preston and Janis Ian. The episode also featured an appearance from comedian Andy Kaufman and a sketch from Muppets creator Jim Henson, as well as SNL cast members Dan Aykroyd, John Belushi, Chevy Chase, Jane Curtin, Garrett Morris, Laraine Newman, and Gilda Radner. The lead-up to the episode was recently dramatized in Jason Reitman’s film, Saturday Night.

The rebroadcast of SNL’s first episode is part of a huge celebratory weekend that also includes a Friday night concert from Radio City Music Hall, and a three-hour live primetime special taking place on Sunday, February 16th.
